title: Rollers - Ricochet [1981] BAY CITY ROLLERS - DUNCAN FAURE
description:
Rollers - Ricochet [1981] 192kbps Joint Stereo [HQ Vinyl Remaster]

01. Doors Bars Metal 
02. Life On The Radio 
03. No Doubt About It 
04. Roxy Lady 
05. Ricochet 
06. Won't You Come Home With Me 
07. Ride 
08. Lay Your Love On The Line 
09. That's Where The Boys Are 
10. Set the Fashion 
11. This Is Your Life 

The band that used to be the Bay City Rollers come of age with this excellent album. New vocalist Duncan Faure was previously from the same band as Trevor Rabin who went on to join Yes. The band was called Rabbitt and was from South Africa.
